#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{int t,m,n,i,j,ex,ey,c;
long long int a[101][101]={0};
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{ex=0;
ey=0;c=0;
scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
{for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
{if(i==m||j==n)
a[i][j]= 2147483647;
else
{scanf("%lld",&a[i][j]);
}
}
}
while(a[ex+1][ey]!=2147483647||a[ex][ey+1]!=2147483647)
{if(a[ex+1][ey]<a[ex][ey+1])
{a[ex][ey]=a[ex+1][ey];
ex++;
}
else
{a[ex][ey]=a[ex][ey+1];
ey++;
}
c++;
}
printf("%d\n",c);
}
return 0;
}
